meanings.definition: The state or quality of being gaseous.
meanings.sent1: The gaseousness of the balloon made it float in the air.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the gaseousness of the atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The gaseousness of the room after the beans dinner was unbearable.
meanings.sent4: The gaseousness of the situation was like a cloud hanging over their heads.
meanings.sent5: The gaseousness of the swamp created an eerie mist that enveloped everything.

meanings.definition: The property of a substance that is in the form of a gas.
meanings.sent1: The gaseousness of the propane tank was a safety concern.
meanings.sent2: The gaseousness of steam is what makes it rise above boiling water.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret ingredient added a surprising gaseousness to the dish.
meanings.sent4: The gaseousness of the perfume filled the room with a sweet aroma.
meanings.sent5: The gaseousness of the helium balloon made it soar high above the crowd.
